includedAssets.title: The Matrix
includedAssets.synopsis: Mind-boggling, eye-popping, and heralding a new era in action movies, the Wachowskis' sci-fi extravaganza stars Keanu Reeves as Neo - a computer hacker who discovers that the world as we see it is not real. It is an illusion created by machines who treat human beings as nothing more than fuel. But some have freed themselves from this 'Matrix' - and resistance leader Morpheus (Laurence Fishburne) wants Neo to join the revolution. So, should he take the blue pill or the red pill...?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Computer geek Keanu Reeves has his world turned inside out when Laurence Fishburne offers to show him the truth. Mind-blowing action.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mind-boggling, eye-popping, and heralding a new era in action movies, the Wachowskis' sci-fi extravaganza stars Keanu Reeves as Neo - a computer hacker who discovers that the world as we see it is not real. It is an illusion created by machines who treat human beings as nothing more than fuel. But some have freed themselves from this 'Matrix' - and resistance leader Morpheus (Laurence Fishburne) wants Neo to join the revolution. So, should he take the blue pill or the red pill...?

includedAssets.title: The Matrix Reloaded
includedAssets.synopsis: Keanu Reeves returns to the Matrix to save mankind from the machines and the increasingly unhinged Agent Smith. Part two of the bullet-dodging sci-fi trilogy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Keanu Reeves returns to the Matrix to save mankind from the machines and the increasingly unhinged Agent Smith. Part two of the sci-fi trilogy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Keanu Reeves returns to the Matrix to save mankind from the machines and the increasingly unhinged Agent Smith. Part two of the bullet-dodging sci-fi trilogy.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: The Matrix Revolutions
includedAssets.synopsis: Keanu Reeves and Laurence Fishburne make a last bid to save humanity from the relentless machines. Electrifying finale to the landmark sci-fi trilogy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Keanu Reeves and Laurence Fishburne make a last bid to save humanity from the machines. Electrifying finale to the trilogy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Keanu Reeves and Laurence Fishburne make a last bid to save humanity from the relentless machines. Electrifying finale to the landmark sci-fi trilogy.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: The Matrix Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Computer hacker Neo learns the true nature of his reality from the mysterious Morpheus and begins a battle against the sentient machines subduing the human population. Classic neo-noir sci-fi trilogy from writer-director duo The Wachowskis. Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Ann Moss and Hugo Weaving star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A computer hacker learns the true nature of his reality and begins a battle to save humanity. Neo-noir sci-fi trilogy starring Keanu Reeves.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Computer hacker Neo learns the true nature of his reality from the mysterious Morpheus and begins a battle against the sentient machines subduing the human population. Classic neo-noir sci-fi trilogy from writer-director duo The Wachowskis. Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Ann Moss and Hugo Weaving star.
